Translations.Text: Ibihano	bikaze	cane	bizoshikira	uwurigata	igikanu	ciwe	n’ugukwiza insaku
N’uwegeranya amatungo yiwe nukuya harura gusa
Mbega yiyumvira yuko amatungo yiwe azoyagumana mu buzima bwiwe bwose
Oya! ntankeka uyo muntu azo jugunywa mu muriro udahera witiriwe Huttwamat
None n’irihe jambo rizo kumenyesha uwo muriro witiriwe Huttwamat
N’umuriro w’Imana wakijwe bimwe bikomeye cane
Mu vy’ukuri uwo muriro udahera abantu babi bazokwugarirwa mwo babe muriwo
